actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to establish a program to demonstrate the feasibility of significantly expanding home ownership opportunities for moderate-income families.

summary.text: Affordable Home Mortgage Act - Amends the Housing and Urban Development Act of 1970 to direct the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to establish and maintain a demonstration project for the purpose of determining the feasibility of having the Government National Mortgage Association provide secondary financing for moderate-income families with mortgages which have graduated rates of amortization.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to establish a program to demonstrate the feasibility of significantly expanding home ownership opportunities for moderate-income families.
